edu.nyu.cs.canvas.view

Interface CanvasObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanvasView

    public interface CanvasObserver
    This is the baseline interface for an observer. The view of Canvas application or any other class that chooses to obey observer pattern must implement the methods of the interface
    Author:
    abhishek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeColor(java.awt.Color color)
      setter for changing the color property of all views
      void changeStroke(int stroke)
      setter for changing the stroke property of all views
      void copyContent(java.util.ArrayList<CanvasPoint> allPoints)
      notifies a view that a stateful update is requested, so that the new view can copy the common drawing state of existing views
      void drawLine(CanvasPoint startPoint, CanvasPoint endPoint)
      Draws a line segment between two point objects with geometric and paint properties
      void reset()
      resets all the views to default configurations
      void setStartPoint(CanvasPoint endPoint)
      Updates all observers to update the new start point for drawing once one piece of drawing is completed

    • Method Detail

      • drawLine

        void drawLine(CanvasPoint startPoint,
            CanvasPoint endPoint)
        Draws a line segment between two point objects with geometric and paint properties
        Parameters:
        startPoint - marks the start position of the segment
        endPoint - marks the end position of the segment

      • changeColor

        void changeColor(java.awt.Color color)
        setter for changing the color property of all views
        Parameters:
        color - is the modified color in model

      • changeStroke

        void changeStroke(int stroke)
        setter for changing the stroke property of all views
        Parameters:
        stroke - is modified stroke in model

      • reset

        void reset()
        resets all the views to default configurations
        See Also:
        CanvasConfig

      • copyContent

        void copyContent(java.util.ArrayList<CanvasPoint> allPoints)
        notifies a view that a stateful update is requested, so that the new view can copy the common drawing state of existing views
        Parameters:
        allPoints - is the present common view state of all points/segments with their geometric and paint properties. This parameter is passed from the model through controller to the observer

      • setStartPoint

        void setStartPoint(CanvasPoint endPoint)
        Updates all observers to update the new start point for drawing once one piece of drawing is completed
        Parameters:
        endPoint - is the 'model entity point' where the current point/line ends
        See Also:
        CanvasPoint
